name: My First Real Game
description:
This game is not perfect nor is it good in any case...

This game means a lot to me but, there are some issues I have with it, there is a video in the game page explaining the background of me and this game...

Controls are:

Arrows (<---/--->) to move. 

Up Arrow to jump.

Goal:

To collect all the collectables and get to the end of the game.

You have 3 lives if you die the entire game resets, sorry about that.  :,(
